issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/178790

pull_request.title: Fix #185821 novayagazeta.ru
pull_request.body:
Fix #185821 novayagazeta.ru

1. Попап внизу страницы, на красном фоне с текстом «Давайте оставаться на связи». Появляется секунд через 30, наверное ещё надо в конец страницы промотать. Ведёт на страницу с предложением подписаться на email-рассылку.
```adblock
novayagazeta.ru###mainNode > div:has(> a[href="/landing/email"])
```
2. При промотке вниз, вверху страницы, sticky попап с текстом «Стать соучастником».
```adblock
novayagazeta.ru###mainNode > div[style="padding-top: 5px;"]:has(> a[href^="https://supportnovaya.club/"])
```
3. В середине статьи блок на всю высотку экрана с просьбой о донате.
```adblock
novayagazeta.ru###article-body div[style="height: 100px;"]:has(> div[style="left: 15px; width: 400px; height: 100px;"])
```
4. В конце статьи блок на всю высотку экрана с просьбой о донате.
```adblock
novayagazeta.ru###article-body div:has(> div > p > span > a[href="mailto:donate@novayagazeta.ru"])
```

issue.title: www.flatpanelshd.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/182198) if other issue.

comment.body:
@Alex-302 thanks for your efforts. Sorry, I thought it was clear but I will provide a detailed description now.

My Setup:
MacBook Pro M1, Macbook Air M1, both on MacOS Sonoma 14.6.1
iPhone 13 and 15, both on iOS 17.6.1

Issue happens on both Macbook.

AdGuard for Mac is installed on the Macbooks.
I installed DB Navigator on Iphone ( https://apps.apple.com/de/app/db-navigator/id343555245 ).
Then i added on my Macbook a Widget that is provided from the DB Navigator App on the iPhone (shows upcoming train connections on the Mac Desktop).

Works when AdGuard is deactivated. With AdGuard activated, the Widget does not any longer connect to the iPhone.


Hope this is clear now, thx again,

Meik

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBo 1.59.1b7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://uwlathletics.com/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

See https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/19801.

`||transcend-cdn.com^$third-party` in the Adguard cookie list (cookies_general) leads to large or complete breakage on a variety of college sports websites.

Blocking this results in `Uncaught TypeError: airgap.toggle is not a function` on all pages; this may be something which is easily dealt with by shim or scriptlet or whatnot (I haven't kept up with writing filters much the past couple years) if that is the best solution.

For some reason I didn't notice this until a while after it was unblock in Easylist cookie, but it was introduced to this list by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f3e045dde8f14e68fe26a3dbdf29f5b6e5ce380e (issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/179568).

comment.body:
Not reproduced on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@
+!
+! *** Only for AdGuard Mv3 extension. ***
+! This file contains temporary duplicate fixes for popular sites, added to another filters.
+! The necessity for this file arises from the fact that static filters in the Mv3 extension are only updated
+! when the extension itself is updated. Due to this, the update process can be delayed for users, potentially
+! leaving them vulnerable to unresolved issues. This file serves as a quick-response solution, ensuring that
+! AdGuard Mv3 extension users experience minimal disruption while awaiting updates of the extension with static filters.
+!
+! Key points:
+! - Purpose: This file used to store temporary rules to address issues, regardless of which filter is
+!   causing the problem or if ads are being missed on popular sites (e.g., YouTube).
+! - Temporary: All rules added to this file are temporary and must be removed after 14 days from the date of their addition.
+! - Flexibility: Rules can be added without restrictions related to the source of the issue, ensuring quick
+!   response to solving important problems.
+!
+
+
+
+
+
+

issue.title: uwlathletics.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBo 1.59.1b7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop and mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://uwlathletics.com/

### Ad Blocking

The issue is in Adguard Cookie

### Add your comment and screenshots

See https://github.com/easylist/easylist/issues/19801.

`||transcend-cdn.com^$third-party` in the Adguard cookie list (cookies_general) leads to large or complete breakage on a variety of college sports websites.

Blocking this results in `Uncaught TypeError: airgap.toggle is not a function` on all pages; this may be something which is easily dealt with by shim or scriptlet or whatnot (I haven't kept up with writing filters much the past couple years) if that is the best solution.

For some reason I didn't notice this until a while after it was unblock in Easylist cookie, but it was introduced to this list by https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/f3e045dde8f14e68fe26a3dbdf29f5b6e5ce380e (issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/179568).

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Fixed, update should be available soon.

comment.body:
United States. Not using a VPN. When I disable AdBlock it works in edge. Chrome didn’t have Adblock installed and worked.  I discovered this with the YouTube TV installed “app” from the Microsoft Edge store.  In testing Edge had same issue with Adblock active.  When I disable it for the TV.YouTube site it works. Not sure which rule is blocking. On Aug 27, 2024, at 8:11 AM, Alex ***@***.***> wrote:﻿
@FogHat54 Hi. Which country?
Cannot watch with VPNs
image.png (view on web)
Cannot reproduce an error from your screenshot.

—Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or unsubscribe.You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID: ***@***.***>

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://google.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fgoogle.com) ### Comment > AdGuard has instructions for blocking certain CSS elements with custom filters, and I’d like to remove Google AI Overviews from my search results. The element Google uses is a div class “GcKpu” for AI overviews. However, adding “Google.com##.GcKpu” to my custom filters does not remove the AI overviews from my searches. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
Hello. 
I won't be able to add this rule to the filters because technically it's not an annoyance or advertisement, other users may even find it useful. You can use this rule by adding it to user rules:
```
google.com##div#searchform ~ div[class] div[class]:has(> [data-initq][data-qc][jsaction][data-hveid])
```

If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).
